features.name: positive_affect
features.coding:
Positive affect, average of "happy" and "relaxed"
0 = not at all
100 = very much

features.name: negative_affect
features.coding:
Negative affect, average of "sad" and "angry", and "stress"
0 = not at all
100 = very much

features.name: happy
features.coding:
Felt happy
0 = not at all
100 = very much

features.name: relaxed
features.coding:
Felt relaxed
0 = not at all
100 = very much

features.name: sad
features.coding:
Felt sad
0 = not at all
100 = very much

features.name: angry
features.coding:
Felt angry
0 = not at all
100 = very much

features.name: stress
features.coding:
Felt stress
0 = not at all
100 = very much
